version_description:
This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.

Happy Riding!

This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.

Happy Riding!

This release adds the ability to follow other members, as well as view your followers and who you’re following from your profile!

***NEW***
• Now you can follow other members by searching from your profile. Just tap the search icon in the top right corner to get started.
• Plus, see your workout counts for Total, Cycling, and Beyond the Ride in a beautiful new design.

***IMPROVEMENTS***
• We fixed a bug that might have caused crashes for some users.

We’d love to have your feedback. Share with us via email at support+feedback@onepeloton.com or through the app (“More” tab > “Support and FAQs” > “Email Support”). Happy riding!

This release adds the ability to follow other members, as well as view your followers and who you’re following from your profile!

***NEW***
• Now you can follow other members by searching from your profile. Just tap the search icon in the top right corner to get started.
• Plus, see your workout counts for Total, Cycling, and Beyond the Ride in a beautiful new design.

***IMPROVEMENTS***
• We fixed a bug that might have caused crashes for some users.

We’d love to have your feedback. Share with us via email at support+feedback@onepeloton.com or through the app (“More” tab > “Support and FAQs” > “Email Support”). Happy riding!

This release makes our app more compatible with iPhone X!

***IMPROVEMENTS***
- We fixed a bug that caused the profile page and class details to render improperly on the iPhone X.

We’d love to have your feedback. Share with us via email at support+feedback@onepeloton.com or through the app (“More” tab > “Support and FAQs” > “Email Support”). Happy riding!

We’d love to have your feedback. Share with us via email at support+feedback@onepeloton.com or through the app (“More” tab > “Support and FAQs” > “Email Support”). Happy riding!

This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.

Happy Riding!

This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.

Happy Riding!

We’re excited to announce a new addition to the Peloton app: the Activity Calendar!

***NEW***
• The Activity Calendar shows you the last 30 days of your Peloton workout activity at a glance. See how many days you’ve worked out, compare your activity level to the previous 30 days, and use the calendar to keep track of your weekly workout goals.
• Your workouts now live on a separate workouts page, which you can access by tapping on your workout counts.

We’re committed to always offering new ways to track your Peloton activity and celebrate your progress, and we look forward to your feedback on this feature. Share with us via email at support+feedback@onepeloton.com or through the app (“More” tab > “Support and FAQs” > “Email Support”). Happy riding!

We’re excited to announce a new addition to the Peloton app: the Activity Calendar!

***NEW***
• The Activity Calendar shows you the last 30 days of your Peloton workout activity at a glance. See how many days you’ve worked out, compare your activity level to the previous 30 days, and use the calendar to keep track of your weekly workout goals.
• Your workouts now live on a separate workouts page, which you can access by tapping on your workout counts.

We’re committed to always offering new ways to track your Peloton activity and celebrate your progress, and we look forward to your feedback on this feature. Share with us via email at support+feedback@onepeloton.com or through the app (“More” tab > “Support and FAQs” > “Email Support”). Happy riding!

This release includes unprecedented access to Peloton classes with the introduction of all-new Peloton Tread Studio workouts, plus all-new outdoor classes!

• For the first time ever, Peloton Tread classes are now available! Choose from bootcamp, running, walking, strength and more, in addition to our ever-growing library of cycling classes
• Take it outside with all-new outdoor running and walking classes led by our elite NYC team of Cycling and Tread instructors and featuring killer playlists

In this release, you can now upload a profile photo to your account. To do this, go to your profile, tap the image and take a photo or choose one from your device.

We're excited to introduce achievements to Peloton Digital. Now, see the badges you've earned across each workout discipline and get a glimpse of all the badges ahead of you.

Here’s what’s new on Peloton Digital:

Audio classes just got better! Now you can view metrics like calories, send and receive High Fives and see what songs are playing.


Introducing Apple Health integration. This feature automatically syncs all of your Peloton workouts with your daily activity in the Health App. To see your performance from a recent Peloton Bike or Tread class in Apple Health, just open the Peloton App to sync your data.

We love hearing from our Members. Join the Official Peloton Member Group on Facebook to share your experience with us.

We love hearing from our Members. Join the Official Peloton Member Group on Facebook to share your experience with us.

Here’s what’s new on Peloton: Introducing Preload for on-demand classes. This feature allows you to preload any class to avoid buffering and save data, so you can take Peloton Digital anywhere you go. Just tap Preload on any class page to get started. Please note that starting a workout still requires an internet connection.

Training programs just got better. We’ve made it easier to build your workout schedule around each week’s plan with day labels above every class.

This feature allows you to preload any class to avoid buffering and save data, so you can take Peloton Digital anywhere you go. Just tap Preload on any class page to get started. Please note that starting a workout still requires an internet connection.

Training programs just got better. We’ve made it easier to build your workout schedule around each week’s plan with day labels above every class.

Introducing a reimagined outdoor class experience on Peloton Digital! With all-new GPS support, you’ll now see the metrics that matter most. Visualize your workouts with our new mapping features as you walk or run, and see a detailed dashboard of your outdoor workouts when you’re finished.

Get the details on what’s new in this release:
Metrics: Distance, Pace, Elevation, Average Speed, and Mile Splits.
GPS: Visualize your workout segments and mile markers on a live map as you run.
Performance: See a detailed summary of your outdoor workouts to make it even easier to track your progress.

Get outside and try out the new features today!

Get the details on what’s new in this release:

GPS: Visualize your workout segments and mile markers on a live map as you run.
Performance: See a detailed summary of your outdoor workouts to make it even easier to track your progress.

Get outside and try out the new features today!
This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.
This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.
This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.

––Workout With Friends––
Connect more with your fellow Members! While in class, your gender, age, and location will now be displayed to others taking the same class at the same time.

If you haven’t already, enter your info by going to your Profile and tapping the edit icon on your profile picture. One benefit of doing so is your calories burned will be more accurate. Prefer to keep your information private? Just enable the privacy option in preferences and your information will not be displayed.

––More Ways to Track Your Running Metrics––
Get more out of your outdoor running metrics! On any completed outdoor class, you can now visualize your metrics along your route. Just tap into the map after you complete your outdoor class to see your pace and elevation metrics.
This release includes under-the-hood improvements to make the Peloton App faster, more reliable, and power future features.
We love hearing your feedback! With our latest update, you’ll be able to rate a class after you complete a workout.

Introducing the Peloton App for Apple Watch. Track your heart rate in all workouts and your pace and distance during indoor runs. These improved controls and metrics are easily accessible, so you’ll never have to slow down during a workout.

Introducing Challenges. Hit your fitness goals, track your progress and stay motivated with Peloton’s seasonal challenges. Challenges give you structured goals to help you keep your workout routine on track, and help show your progress by earning meals and badges for completing each one. Enter into The Annual to track your workout minutes throughout 2020, or try the February Activity Challenge to aim for 5, 10, or even 15 workout days in any of our workout disciplines to earn a medal. New challenges appear each month. Stay on the lookout for unique flash challenges throughout the year to keep your routine fresh.

Introducing Chromecast - a new way to work out with Peloton on your big screen by Casting from your iPhone or iPad. Experience an even smoother class and focus on your workout without interruptions from calls and notifications. Flow, stretch, and build strength right from your living room.

Introducing Chromecast - a new way to work out with Peloton on your big screen by Casting from your iPhone or iPad. Experience an even smoother class and focus on your workout without interruptions from calls and notifications. Flow, stretch, and build strength right from your living room.

New: Challenges with friends. Now, when you join a Challenge, you’ll see who else is in. Track each others’ progress and motivate yourselves to hit your goals and earn badges!

Introducing Tags, a new way to represent your identity and work out with others in the Peloton community! Once you join a Tag, you'll see popular workouts and class recommendations. With Tags, you can see who is working out with you and can motivate one another when you work out together. To get started, add yourself to an existing Tag or create your own.

Now you can:
- Add up to 10 Tags to your profile to express who you are
- Discover Tags by browsing existing or creating your own
- Connect with others with the same Tags by joining others with the same Tags in Peloton workouts
- Browse Tags in four categories: Trending, Featured, Friends and Popular

With Tags, be a part of the supportive and motivating Peloton community. Join #TogetherWeGoFar to get started!

Skip Intro: Now you can get right into your workout as soon as you're ready to sweat. Available for most on demand classes.

We fixed bugs that caused live classes to skip and an incorrect number of active days to appear in your profile, along with other bug fixes and performance improvements.

Schedule Your Workouts: Plan your workouts ahead of time and keep yourself accountable by adding live and on-demand classes to your personal Schedule on the App. Then invite your friends to join your workouts to sweat together.

Schedule Your Workouts: Plan your workouts ahead of time and keep yourself accountable by adding live and on-demand classes to your personal Schedule on the App. Then invite your friends to join your workouts to sweat together.

We've made updates to the app to give you a more seamless workout experience.

Modify Your Schedule: Easily reschedule or remove classes when you tap the edit icon on your scheduled classes.

Connect to Facebook: Find your friends when you connect your Facebook account directly from the app. Navigate to the More tab to get started.

We also fixed bugs that caused issues with buttons on the class details page, along with other performance improvements.

We've made updates to the app to give you a more seamless workout experience.

Modify Your Schedule: Easily reschedule or remove classes when you tap the edit icon on your scheduled classes.

Connect to Facebook: Find your friends when you connect your Facebook account directly from the app. Navigate to the More tab to get started.

We also fixed bugs that caused issues with buttons on the class details page, along with other performance improvements.

We've made updates to the app to improve your workout experience.

All Bookmarked Classes: Easily view all your bookmarked classes from across disciplines in one place. Scroll to the bottom of the Classes tab to get started.

Custom Audio Mixing: Pick an audio mix for your preferred class experience. Toggle the sound between more instructor or more music while you're working out.

We've also made bug fixes and performance improvements.

Custom Audio Mixing: Pick an audio mix for your preferred class experience. Toggle the sound between more instructor or more music while you're working out.

We've also made bug fixes and performance improvements.

Programs: We've added new Programs designed by our instructors to help you reach your goals, plus improved features to keep you motivated. Track how you're doing with a progress bar and earn achievements along the way.
